member.name: CBTACTIVATESTRUCT
member.summary: Contains information passed to a WH_CBT hook procedure, CBTProc, before a window is activated.

member.name: CBTACTIVATESTRUCT.fMouse
member.summary: This member is TRUE if a mouse click is causing the activation or FALSE if it is not.

member.name: CBTACTIVATESTRUCT.hWndActive
member.summary: A handle to the active window.
